name: Spokesworm
description:
Spokesworm is an interactive interview simulator where you are a suited worm trying to spin a PR nightmare into something much less so.

Inspired by daily real world behaviors, you must respond to questions put to you and then feel the wrath of a population that is active on social media. Your ultimate aim is to shape public perception in your favour.

Spokesworm is the second Chalk In Jam, a prototype conceived and built during the 19th week of 2016 by Chalk In Rain.

Chalk In Rain is:

  • Emre Deniz - @Emre_C_Deniz
  • Gerard Delaney - @verbvirus
